Sandra Pereira ''Winner'' Martim Vicente December 31 Carolina Deslandes December 26 Adriano Diouf December 19 Maria Bradshaw December 19 Neemias Silva December 5 Joceline Medina November 28 GonÃ§alo Dias November 21 Maria Manuel November 14 Gerson Santos November 7 | website = http://idolos.sapo.pt/ }} '''''Ãdolos''''' is a [[reality television]] show based on the popular British show [[Pop Idol]]. The show is a contest to determine the best young singer in Portugal. The first two seasons were hosted by SÃ­lvia Alberto and Pedro Granger. The show, then went to a sort of hiatus, and, after only a lukewarm reaction by the viewers for season two, the show has officially been replaced by another casting show on its broadcast station, ''FamÃ­lia Superstar'', which ended in 2008.
After an absence for four years the show returned for a third season to SIC in fall 2009 now with JoÃ£o Manzarra and ClÃ¡udia Vieira hosting. Season 3 finished in February 2010, and Season 4 started in September.
Ãdolos had three audition cities to find the best talent in all of Portugal, including: [[Porto]], [[Beja (Portugal)|Beja]] and [[Lisbon]]. However, in the third and fourth seasons, auditions were made in [[Porto]], [[Lisbon]], [[Aveiro, Portugal|Aveiro]], [[PortimÃ£o, Portugal|PortimÃ£o]] and [[Estoril]].
